name: beer

A1 [ U or C ] an alcoholic drink made from grain and hops (= a type of plant): He asked for a pint of beer. This beer is brewed in Mexico.
A1 [ C ] a glass or container of this drink: After a hard day's work I enjoy a beer or two.
More examplesFewer examplesThere's plenty more beer in the fridge.The morning after the party, the whole house stank of beer and cigarettes.One unit of alcohol is equal to half a pint of beer or a standard measure of spirits.After we've played a match, we sit and chat over a few beers.He'd already drunk four beers before I'd finished one.
